title: Development of a direct PMMA-PCB bonding method for low cost and rapid prototyping of microfluidic-based gas analysers
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22598-22605
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03039G, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Katayoun Emadzadeh, Vahid Ghafarinia
A direct bonding method using patterned copper and solvent has been investigated for PCB-PMMA bonding. A PCB based sensor integration method is presented that enables rapid prototyping of lab-on-PCB devices for gas analysis.
